forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 13C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 14C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 58F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 48F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
